info.title: Saas Pro
info.description:
APIs to interface with communications tax engine.
To authenticate, set request header parameter api_key to Base64 encoded UserId:Password.
Users with access to multiple clients must also set request header parameters for client_id and client_profile_id.

get.description: Returns the server time in UTC.

get.summary: Get the version of the AFC tax engine
get.description: Returns the version of the AFC tax engine.

get.summary: Get the version of the Rest APIs
get.description: Returns the version of the REST APIs.

get.summary: Get the AFC tax engine database version
get.description: Returns the AFC tax engine database version.

post.summary: Calculate taxes on a bridge conference transaction
post.description:
This method will take a Billing address, Bridge Address, Host Address (optional) and list of participants.
            The system will determine which taxes apply for each participant and return the summarized taxes for the bridge 
            conference transaction. The individual participant results are returned if ReturnParticipantResults is true.

parameters.name: transaction
parameters.description: Bridge conference transaction details including list of participants.

post.summary: Calculate tax adjustments on a bridge conference transaction
post.description:
This method will take a Billing address, Bridge Address, Host Address (optional) and list of participants.
            The system will determine which taxes apply for each participant and return the summarized tax adjustments for the bridge 
            conference transaction. The individual participant results are returned if ReturnParticipantResults is true.

parameters.name: transaction
parameters.description: Bridge conference transaction details including list of participants.

post.description: This method accepts transaction data and performs appropriate tax adjustment calculations.

parameters.name: anAdjustment
parameters.description: Transaction data.

post.description: Determines the taxing jurisdiction for a transaction and returns the PCode at the lowest jurisdiction level.

parameters.name: aTransaction
parameters.description: Transaction data.

post.summary: Calculate taxes for a pro-rated transaction
post.description:
Accepts a pro-rated percentage that is used to calculate the taxable amount on the transaction 
            and perform tax calculations.

parameters.name: transaction
parameters.description: Transaction data with pro-rated percent specified as a decimal.

post.summary: Calculate tax adjustments for a pro-rated transaction
post.description:
Accepts a pro-rated percentage that is used to calculate the taxable amount on the transaction 
            and perform tax adjustments.

parameters.name: transaction
parameters.description: Transaction data with pro-rated percent specified as a decimal.

post.description: This method accepts transaction data and performs appropriate tax calculations.

parameters.name: aTransaction
parameters.description: Transaction data.

post.summary: Calculates taxes on a transaction batch.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: List of transactions to process and default transaction values.

post.description:
This method accepts transaction data and performs a reverse tax adjustment in order to arrive at the 
            base sale amount and taxes for the desired total charge.

parameters.name: anAdjustment
parameters.description: Transaction details.

post.description:
This method accepts transaction data and performs a reverse tax calculation in order to arrive at the 
            base sale amount and taxes for the desired total charge.

parameters.name: aTransaction
parameters.description: Transaction details.

post.description:
Accepts transaction and tax rate override data to perform tax calculations with the provided 
            override information.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Transaction data to be processed and tax rate override list.

post.description:
Accepts transaction and tax rate override data to perform tax adjustments with the provided 
            override information.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Transaction data to be processed and tax rate override list.

post.description: This method accepts transaction data and performs appropriate tax calculations.

parameters.name: commitData
parameters.description: Document number and optional field information.

post.summary: Process transactions and adjustments in customer mode
post.description: Processes a batch of transactions and adjustments in customer mode.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description:
Object containing batch of transactions and adjustments to be processed along
            with nexus and exclusion information.

post.description:
Converts the given request data to a PCode. 
            Only one of the fields should be used for the conversion: ZipAddress, FipsCode or NPANXX.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Object containing ZipAddress, FipsCode or NPANXX to be converted.

get.summary: Convert a PCode to FIPS code
get.description: This method returns the FIPS code for the specified PCode.

parameters.name: pCode
parameters.description: PCode for jurisdiction.

get.summary: Get address information for a jurisdiction
get.description: This method returns a list of addresses for the specified jurisdiction.

parameters.name: pCode
parameters.description: PCode for jurisdiction.

post.summary: Lookup jurisdictions by location name and/or postal code
post.description:
Searches jurisdiction matches for the address provided. The results may be an exact match or potential matches as
            specified by the BestMatch attribute in the input parameter object.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Object containig location search criteria.

get.description: List of countries with details including name, PCode, ISO code and IOC code.

get.summary: Lookup all states in a given country
get.description: List of states/provinces/regions in a given country with details including name, two-letter code, and any counties within.

parameters.name: countryIso
parameters.description: Three-letter ISO Code identifying a country.

get.summary: Lookup all cities for a given country and state/province/region.
get.description: List of cities in a given country and state/province/region with details including name, Postal/ZIP Code, county and PCode.

parameters.name: countryIso
parameters.description: Three-letter ISO Code identifying a country.

parameters.name: stateCode
parameters.description: Two-letter state code indentifying a state.

get.summary: Get tax category for a tax type
get.description: This method returns the tax category for the specified tax type.

parameters.name: taxType
parameters.description: Tax type ID to get the category description for.

get.summary: Get the tax description for a tax type
get.description: This method returns the description for the specified tax type ID.

parameters.name: taxType
parameters.description: Tax type ID to get the description for.

get.summary: Get tax rates for a jurisdiction
get.description: Returns the tax rate information for a jurisdiction identified by the specified PCode.

parameters.name: pCode
parameters.description: PCode for jurisdiction.

get.summary: Get list of all Transaction-Service pairs.

BridgeConferenceTransaction.description: Contains data required for performing tax calculations on bridge conference transactions.

ProcessInvalidParticipant.description:
Flag indicating whether invalid participant jurisdiction should cause the transaction to fail (false)
            or whether the participant should be processed with greatest tax liability (true).

ReturnParticipantTaxes.description: Indicates whether individual participant taxes should be returned in the response.

CustomerType.description: Customer Type. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for valid customer types.

BusinessClass.description: Business Class. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for valid business classes.

Sale.description: Indicates if this is a retail sale. Use false for resale/wholesale transactions.

ServiceClass.description: Service class. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid service classes.

Date.description: Transaction date. Field is provided to allow rating and taxing to occur on a date other than the billing date.

Charge.description: Charge amount to customer for transaction.

Incorporated.description: True if this transaction is within an incorporated area of the local jurisdiction, otherwise false.

FederalExempt.description: True if transaction is exempt from Federal Tax, otherwise false.

StateExempt.description: True if transaction is exempt from State Tax, otherwise false.

CountyExempt.description: True if transaction is exempt from County Tax, otherwise false.

LocalExempt.description: True if transaction is exempt from Local Tax, otherwise false.

ExemptionType.description: Exemption type. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid exemption types.

CompanyIdentifier.description:
Company identifier. Use the 3-character company identifier provided by Avalara to your organization 
            in order to include this transaction in the monthly compliance reports. Otherwise, leave empty.

AdjustmentMethod.description: Adjustment method. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid adjustment methods.

Lines.description: Number of lines sold to customer when applicable.

Minutes.description: Number of minutes for call when appropriate.

Debit.description: Determines if this is a prepaid debit card transaction.

DiscountType.description: Discount Type. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for valid discount types.

FacilitiesBased.description: Specifies if the carrier delivering the service has company owned facilities to provide the service.

Franchise.description: Indicates if the company provides services sold pursuant to a franchise agreement between the carrier and jurisdiction.

Lifeline.description: Indicates if customer is a Lifeline participant.

Exclusions.description: List of states for tax exclusions.

OptionalFields.description: User-defined list of optional alphanumeric fields.

Commit.description: Indicates if the transaction should be committed as soon at it is processed.

ZipAddress.description: Information used for looking up jurisidictions using location names and/or zip codes.

BridgeConferenceParticipant.description: Structure returned when invoking the bridge conference tax calculation APIs.

ParticipantAddress.description:
Address for participant - all participants must use address values if any participant uses an address. 
            Not required if ParticipantPCode or ParticipantNpaNxx are specified.

ParticipantPCode.description:
PCode forpParticipant – all participants must use PCode values if any participant uses PCode.
            Not required if ParticipantAddress or ParticipantNpaNxx are specified.

ParticipantNpaNxx.description:
NpaNxx for participant – all participants must use NPANXX values if any participant uses NPANXX.
            Not required if ParticipantAddress or ParticipantPCode are specified.

ParticipantRef.description:
Alpha-numeric reference that will tie a participant in the request to participant taxes in response
            if ReturnParticipantTaxes is true. Max 127 bytes.

TaxExemption.description: Contains information for exemption a single tax.

TaxLevel.description: Tax level. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid tax levels.

TaxType.description: Tax type. See the Telecom Mapping guidelines ("TM_00505_AFC Telecom Mapping Guidelines.pdf") for a list of valid tax types.

Exclusion.description: Specifies a tax exclusion by state.

CountryISO.description: Three-character country ISO code. Required if State not specified.

State.description: Two-character state abbreviation. Required if CountryISO not specified.

ExclusionOn.description: True if entity exclusion applies in the state, otherwise false.

CategoryExemption.description: Specifies tax exemptions based on the tax category.

CountryISO.description: Three-character country ISO code. Required if State is not specified.

State.description: Two-character state abbreviation. Required if CountryISO is not specified.

TaxCategory.description: Tax Category. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for valid tax categories.

OptionalField.description: Data structure used to provide optional alphanumeric data for transactions.

OptionalKeyNo.description: Key number (1 to 10) for optional field.

BridgeConferenceResults.description: Structure returned when invoking the bridge conference tax calculation APIs.

BridgeConferenceParticipantResult.description: Structure returned when invoking the bridge conference tax calculation APIs.

ErrorCode.description: Error code for participant tax calculation (as applicable).

ParticipantTaxes.description: List of objects that contain information about the taxes for an individual participant.

TaxData.description: Tax information returned from tax calculation APIs.

AdjustmentType.description: Adjustmnet type. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid adjustment types.

Billable.description: Indicates if the tax is billable to the customer.

CalculationType.description: Calculation type. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid calculation types.

Compliance.description: Indicates if the tax is reportable to the jurisdiction.

ExemptSaleAmount.description: Amount of the charge exempt from taxes.

RefundUncollect.description: Taxable measure if tax is smaller than 0 (tax adjustments).

Surcharge.description: Indicates if tax is considered a surcharge.

TaxableMeasure.description: Amount of sale subject to tax plus any taxed taxes.

TaxLevel.description: Tax level. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid tax levels.

TaxType.description: Tax type. See the Telecom Mapping guidelines ("TM_00505_AFC Telecom Mapping Guidelines.pdf") for a list of valid tax types.

Lines.description: Number of lines used to calculate the tax (for per-line tax calculations).

Minutes.description: Number of minutes used to calculate the tax (for per-minute tax calculations).

OptionalFields.description: User-defined list of optional alphanumeric fields.

Transaction.description: Transaction data required for processing tax calculations.

IsPrivateLine.description: Indicates if the transaction is a private line transaction.

PrivateLineSplit.description:
For private line transactions, this is the split between the ending points of a private line.
            The value indicates how much the portion of the charge belongs to the origin user.

CustomerType.description: Customer type. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid customer types.

BusinessClass.description: Business class. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid business classes.

Sale.description: Indicates if this is a retail sale. Use false for resale/wholesale transactions.

ServiceClass.description: Service class. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid Service Classes

Date.description: Transaction date.  Field is provided to allow rating and taxing to occur on a date other than the billing date.

Charge.description: Charge amount to customer for transaction

Incorporated.description: True if this transaction is within an incorporated area of the local jurisdiction, otherwise False.

FederalExempt.description: True if transaction is exempt from Federal Tax, otherwise false.

StateExempt.description: True if transaction is exempt from State Tax, otherwise false.

CountyExempt.description: True if transaction is exempt from County Tax, otherwise false.

LocalExempt.description: True if transaction is exempt from Local Tax, otherwise false.

ExemptionType.description: Exemtion type. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid exemption types.

CompanyIdentifier.description:
Company identifier. Use the 3-character company identifier provided by Avalara to your organization 
            in order to include this transaction in the monthly compliance reports. Otherwise, leave empty.

AdjustmentMethod.description: Adjustment method. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid adjustment methods.

Lines.description: Number of lines sold to customer when applicable.

Minutes.description: Number of minutes for call when appropriate.

Debit.description: Determines if this is a prepaid debit card transaction.

AdjustmentDiscount.description: Adjustment discount type. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid discount types.

FacilitiesBased.description: Specifies if the carrier delivering the service has company owned facilitiesprovide the service.

Franchise.description: Indicates if the company provides services sold pursuant to a franchise agreement between the carrier and jurisdiction.

Lifeline.description: Indicates if customer is a Lifeline participant.

Exclusions.description: List of states for tax exclusions.

OptionalFields.description: User-defined list of optional alphanumeric fields.

TaxInclusive.description: Indicates if the charge of this transaction is tax-inclusive (reverse tax calculation).

SafeHarborOverrides.description: List of overrides for the USF safe harbor rate.

Commit.description: Indicates if the transaction should be committed as soon at it is processed.

SafeHarborOverride.description: Data structure used to override the safe harbor rate for a USF tax type.

SafeHarborType.description: Safe harbor type (1 = Cellular, 2 = VoIP, 4 = Paging).

OriginalFederalTam.description: Original Federal TAM value to override.

NewFederalTam.description: New TAM value that will replace the original TAM value.

ProRatedTransaction.description: Parameter for pro-rated tax calculation API.

ProRatedPercent.description: Percentage to prorate specified as a decimal.

MultiRequestInput.description: Input parameter for tax calculation batch API.

DefaultValues.description: Transaction containing default values to be populated on all transactions included in the batch.

Transactions.description: List of transactions to be processed.

MultiRequestItem.description: Transaction input data used for batch tax calculation APIs.

AdjustmentDiscount.description: Adjustment discount type. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid discount types.

AdjustmentMethod.description: Adjustment method. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid adjustment methods.

Charge.description: Charge amount to customer for transaction.

CountyExempt.description: True if transaction is exempt from County Tax, otherwise false.

Date.description: Transaction date.  Field is provided to allow rating and taxing to occur on a date other than the billing date.

Debit.description: Determines if this is a prepaid debit card transaction.

ExemptionType.description: Exemtion type. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid exemption types.

FacilitiesBased.description: Specifies if the carrier delivering the service has company owned facilitiesprovide the service.

FederalExempt.description: True if transaction is exempt from Federal Tax, otherwise false.

Franchise.description: Indicates if the company provides services sold pursuant to a franchise agreement between the carrier and jurisdiction.

Incorporated.description: True if this transaction is within an incorporated area of the local jurisdiction, otherwise False.

IsAdjustment.description: If set to true, indicates that this transaction must be processed as an adjustment.

Lifeline.description: Indicates if customer is a Lifeline participant.

Lines.description: Number of lines sold to customer when applicable.

LocalExempt.description: True if transaction is exempt from Local Tax, otherwise false.

Minutes.description: Number of minutes for call when appropriate.

StateExempt.description: True if transaction is exempt from State Tax, otherwise false.

ProRatedPct.description:
For pro-rated transactions, indicates the percentage to prorate specified as a decimal. Must not be 
            included in request if transaction is not pro-rated. Does not apply for tax-inclusive tax calculations.

Sale.description: Indicates if this is a retail sale. Use false for resale/wholesale transactions.

TaxInclusive.description: Indicates if the charge of this transaction is tax-inclusive (reverse tax calculation).

IsPrivateLine.description: Indicates if the transaction is a private line transaction.

PrivateLineSplit.description:
For private line transactions, this is the split between the ending points of a private line.
            The value indicates how much the portion of the charge belongs to the origin user.

CustomerType.description: Customer type. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid customer types.

BusinessClass.description: Business class. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid business classes.

ServiceClass.description: Service class. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid Service Classes

CompanyIdentifier.description:
Company identifier. Use the 3-character company identifier provided by Avalara to your organization 
            in order to include this transaction in the monthly compliance reports. Otherwise, leave empty.

Exclusions.description: List of states for tax exclusions.

OptionalFields.description: User-defined list of optional alphanumeric fields.

SafeHarborOverrides.description: List of overrides for the USF safe harbor rate.

Commit.description: Indicates if the transaction should be committed as soon at it is processed.

MultiRequestResult.description: Tax calculation results for a single transaction within a transaction batch.

BaseSaleAmount.description: For tax-inclusive tax calculations. Base sale amount necessary to arrive at desired total tax.

ErrorMessage.description: Error message if transaction failed to be processed.

ReverseTaxResults.description: Structure returned when invoking the reverse tax calculation APIs.

BaseSaleAmount.description: Base sale amount necessary to arrive at desired total tax.

CalculateWithOverridesRequest.description: Paremeter for the tax calculation with override APIs.

Overrides.description: List of tax rate overrides to be applied in tax calculations.

TaxRateOverrideInfo.description: Contains information required to override a tax rate.

Pcode.description: Jurisdiction PCode for this tax rate override.

Scope.description: Scope for override. See the "TM_00101_AFC User Manual_Telecom.pdf" for valid values.

TaxType.description: Tax type. See the Telecom Mapping guidelines ("TM_00505_AFC Telecom Mapping Guidelines.pdf") for a list of valid tax types.

TaxLevel.description: Tax level. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid tax levels.

LevelExemptible.description: Indicates if the tax can be exempted using level exemptions.

TaxBracketInfo.description: Contains tax rate information for a tax bracket.

Rate.description: Tax rate. Value cannot be negative. For rated taxes, value must be from 0 to 1. Otherwise, value may be larger.

MaxBase.description: Maximum base that this rate applies to.

CountyOverrideTax.description: For sales and use taxes only (tax types 1 and 49), overrides the rate for the tax at the county level.

StateOverrideTax.description: For sales and use taxes only (tax types 1 and 49), overrides the rate for the tax at the state level.

StateOverrideOn.description: For sales and use taxes only (tax types 1 and 49) indicates that this tax replaces the tax at the state level.

CountyOverrideOn.description: For sales and use taxes only (tax types 1 and 49), indicates that this tax replaces the tax at the county level.

Committed.description: Indicates if transactions for the specified document code should be committed.

CustomerNumber.description: Overrides value for CustomerNumber field in reports.

InvoiceNumber.description: Overrides value for InvoiceNumber field in reports.

Optional.description: Overrides value for Optional field in reports.

Optional4.description: Overrides value for Optional4 field in reports.

Optional5.description: Overrides value for Optional5 field in reports.

Optional6.description: Overrides value for Optional6 field in reports.

Optional7.description: Overrides value for Optional7 field in reports.

Optional8.description: Overrides value for Optional8 field in reports.

Optional9.description: Overrides value for Optional9 field in reports.

Optional10.description: Overrides value for Optional10 field in reports.

OptionalAlpha1.description: Overrides value for OptionalAlpha1 field in reports.

OptionalFields.description: Overrides value for OptionalFields field in reports.

Exclusions.description: List of states for tax exclusions.

ReturnDetail.description: Indicates if the individual transaction taxes should be returned in the response.

Commit.description: Indicates if the transaction should be committed as soon at it is processed.

CustomerResults.description: Data structure returned when processing transactions in customer mode.

CustomerTaxData.description: Summarized tax data for a customer returned when using the customer mode API.

TaxType.description: Tax type. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid tax types.

TaxLevel.description: Tax level. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid tax levels.

CalculationType.description: Calculation type. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid calculation types.

ExemptSaleAmount.description: Amount of the charge exempt from taxes.

Surcharge.description: Indicates if tax is considered a surcharge.

MaxBase.description: Max amount to which tax is applied.

MinBase.description: Min amount to which tax is applied.

ExcessTax.description: Rate for amount above max base.

TotalCharge.description: Sum of charges for this customer.

Lines.description: Number of lines used to calculate the tax (for per-line tax calculations).

Minutes.description: Number of minutes used to calculate the tax (for per-minute tax calculations).

RequestPCodeDetail.description: Contains location information for PCode conversion.

FipsCode.description: Fips code - leave null if other value is used.

NpaNxx.description: NPANXX - leave null if other value is used.

ZipAddress.description: Zip Address - leave null if other value is used.

AddressData.description: Contains location and zip code range information for a jurisdiction.

ZipLookupRequest.description: Location data used as input for searching jurisdiction matches.

ZipCode.description: 5-digit zip code (full zip code for Canadian addresses).

BestMatch.description: Flag indicating whether to return the best matches (true) or exact matches only (false).

LimitResults.description: Maximum number of results to return.

ZipLookupResult.description: Jurisdiction information returned when searching location matches.

LocationData.description: List of location matches for the address being searched.

InputMatchType.description: Match type from user input. "Exact" match or "Best" match.

MatchTypeApplied.description: Indicates whether the matches returned are based on an "Exact" match or "Best" match.

ResultsLimit.description: Maximum number of results applied to search.

LocationItem.description: Contains name and jurisdiction PCode information for a location.

TaxRateInfo.description: Tax rate information for a tax.

TaxType.description: Tax type. See the Telecom Mapping guidelines ("TM_00505_AFC Telecom Mapping Guidelines.pdf") for a list of valid tax types.

TaxLevel.description: Tax level. See the "TM_00116_AFC SaaS pro Telecom Developer Manual.pdf" for a list of valid tax levels.

TaxRateHistory.description: Historical tax rate information for a tax.

LevelExemptible.description: Indicates if the tax can be exempted using level exemptions.
